description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. DUOtris+ is a colour matching puzzle game with double the action! Play two boards simulatenously in this fast paced, psychedelic game.  DUOtris+ is double the puzzle, double the addiction and double the fun!
